title: Klitzman's Isle: A Novel of Erotic Domination
description: A NOVEL OF EROTIC DOMINATION - A young French girl and a street smart small time hood named Harry Wiggins are 'recruited' by the notorious international criminal known only as Klitzman to serve at his exclusive and remote island resort - one as a potential manager, the other to join other enslaved young women who are offered to those cruel enough and rich enough to visit the 'Resort'. The French girl was just unfortunate to attract Klitzman's agent's attention, but Harry plays a dangerous game of double-cross among the temptations of unbridled depravity.
author: Paul Blades
